talk.abstract: We will discuss how to profile Python code, how to interpret profiles, and how (and how not) to use profiling to improve your code's run-time performance. We will look at both built-in and external tools (including RunSnakeRun and SnakeViz). We will also discuss the wider issues of how to approach optimization in your code base.
talk.description: We will discuss how to profile Python code, how to interpret profiles, and how (and how not) to use profiling to improve your code's run-time performance. We will look at both built-in and external tools (including RunSnakeRun and SnakeViz). We will also discuss the wider issues of how to approach optimization in your code base.
talk.name: Profiling for Performance
talk.title: Profiling for Performance
